metadata.name: Afflicted
metadata.description: With great power comes great irresponsibility.  They’re young. They’re fun. They have powers. And you will fear them. High school has never been this deadly. When seventeen-year-old Madison Thomas moves to Yuma, AZ, she quickly becomes infatuated with the most feared clique in high school. Problem is they all have horrifying super powers they use to do whatever they want. And now the leader of the group, Kevin, is obsessed with afflicting Madison with their super-powered curse – unless her twin brother Lincoln can stop them.
